data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 149,201 believers in Haut-Bassins, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Haut-Bassins, Burkina Faso
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Haut-Bassins, Burkina Faso.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Haut-Bassins to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,111,735, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Bolon people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, we pray that the people of Haut-Bassins, Burkina Faso will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Haut-Bassins, Burkina Faso not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Haut-Bassins, Burkina Faso has a population of 1,410,300.

We estimate Haut-Bassins has 149,201 people who might know Jesus, 149,363 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,111,735 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Haut-Bassins you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.
